comments:
Build: F1

1. Create a remote launch configuration.
2. Launch it without launching the remote app. We write the 
ConnectException to the log.

We shouldn't log this exception.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.launching 4 113 May 28, 2002 14:31:41.942
!MESSAGE Failed to connect to remote VM as connection was refused
!STACK 0
java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.doConnect(PlainSocketImpl.java:305)
	at 
java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(PlainSocketImpl.java:171)
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:158)

	at

	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.JavaRemoteApplicationLaunchConfigurationDelegate.launch(JavaRemoteApplicationLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:54)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:141)

	at 
org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection(ActionContributionItem.java:407)
	at 
org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetEvent(ActionContributionItem.java:361)

org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$0(ActionContributionItem.java:352)

org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:1223)

org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1085)

	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run(InternalBootLoader.java:739)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:432)
	at EclipseRuntimeLauncher.main(EclipseRuntimeLauncher.java:24)

Suggest to leave as is. This is generic function in the DebugUIPlugin - when an 
error dialog is shown, we also log the exception for extra information 
(potentially to help with debugging user problems). I do not want to remove the 
generic error logging at this point.
*** Bug 20941 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
